title: Generative AI in the Workplace - Professional Development
subject: Technology & Professional Development
standards: AI-PROF-1: Demonstrate understanding of generative AI fundamentals and capabilities in workplace contexts.
AI-PROF-2: Develop and implement effective prompt engineering techniques for professional tasks.
AI-PROF-3: Apply ethical frameworks and best practices for responsible AI use in professional environments.

weeks.weeklyObjective: Understand the basic fundamentals and capabilities of generative AI

days.todaysLearning: Today, participants will be introduced to the transformative world of generative AI and its impact on modern workplaces. We'll explore what generative AI is, its core capabilities, and why it's becoming essential for professional success. Through engaging demonstrations and real-world examples, participants will develop a foundational understanding of AI technologies that will be built upon in subsequent lessons.

lessons.title: Introduction to Generative AI
objectives: Define what generative AI is
Identify the basic capabilities of AI tools
activities: Welcome activity: AI myths vs reality discussion
lessons.assessment: Exit ticket: Three things learned about AI
lessons.homework: Explore one AI tool and document first impressions

days.todaysLearning: Today, participants will get hands-on experience using various AI tools under guided instruction. They will learn proper prompting techniques and compare different AI platforms, noting their unique strengths and applications. This practical workshop experience will reinforce theoretical knowledge and develop essential AI communication skills.

lessons.title: AI Tools Hands-On Workshop
objectives: Use AI tools effectively for basic tasks
Compare different AI platforms and their strengths
activities: Guided practice: Using ChatGPT, Claude, and Copilot
Workshop activity: Comparing AI platform outputs
lessons.assessment: Completed workshop activities with AI outputs and comparisons
lessons.homework: Complete practice prompts from workshop

days.todaysLearning: Today's focus will be on AI applications for content creation and professional communication. Participants will learn about various AI writing tools and their specific functions, developing an understanding of how these tools work together as a professional 'toolkit'. Interactive activities and practical exercises will help participants visualize AI capabilities and their professional applications.

lessons.title: AI for Content Creation
objectives: Identify major AI content creation tools
Explain the function of each AI application
activities: Review of previous day's tool exploration
Interactive presentation: AI content creation tools
Group activity: Content creation function cards
Digital exploration: AI writing assistant simulation
lessons.homework: Create AI tool reference guide

days.todaysLearning: Today, participants will begin their AI implementation strategy projects. They will apply their knowledge of AI capabilities to design and plan effective workplace integration approaches. This project-based learning activity will help consolidate their understanding of AI tools while allowing for personalized application and strategic planning.

lessons.title: AI Strategy Planning Project
objectives: Design an AI implementation strategy for your role
Identify specific tools for workplace integration
activities: Brainstorming session: AI opportunities in your work
lessons.homework: Research AI tools specific to your industry

days.todaysLearning: Today, participants will explore AI ethics and responsible AI use foundations. They will learn about the importance of ethical considerations in AI implementation and begin developing frameworks for responsible AI adoption in their workplace contexts. This foundational ethics session prepares participants for more advanced ethical discussions later in the course.

lessons.title: AI Ethics Foundations
objectives: Understand basic AI ethics principles
Identify ethical considerations in workplace AI use
activities: Group exploration: Ethical dilemmas in AI use
lessons.homework: Reflect on ethical considerations in your planned AI use

weeks.weeklyObjective: Master advanced AI techniques and explore specialized applications

days.todaysLearning: Today, participants will explore advanced AI prompting techniques and their specialized applications for complex workplace tasks. Through lectures, videos, and group activities, they will learn to craft sophisticated prompts and identify different approaches for various professional scenarios.

lessons.title: Advanced Prompting Techniques
objectives: Master chain-of-thought and complex prompting
Identify specialized prompting approaches
lessons.homework: Practice advanced prompts in your work context

days.todaysLearning: Today, participants will conduct experiments with AI for data analysis and research tasks, understanding how AI processes and interprets information. This hands-on activity will help them visualize AI capabilities for complex analytical work and appreciate the importance of prompt structure for research applications.

lessons.title: AI for Data Analysis Workshop
objectives: Use AI for data interpretation and analysis
Apply AI for research and information synthesis
lessons.homework: Complete AI research analysis project

days.todaysLearning: Today, participants will work on developing their AI implementation strategies, applying their knowledge of advanced AI techniques and specialized applications. They will receive feedback from peers and the instructor, refining their strategies to ensure practicality and effectiveness.

lessons.title: AI Strategy Development Workshop
objectives: Develop comprehensive AI implementation strategies
Incorporate advanced techniques into workplace plans
lessons.homework: Continue refining AI implementation strategy

days.todaysLearning: Today, participants will learn how AI tools integrate into existing workflows and how individual AI applications form comprehensive workplace solutions. Through interactive activities and digital explorations, they will visualize the relationships between different AI tools and their combined impact on productivity.

lessons.title: AI Workflow Integration
objectives: Explain how AI tools integrate into workflows
Describe how individual tools create comprehensive solutions
activities: Lecture: From individual tools to integrated workflows
lessons.homework: Create workflow map: Current to AI-enhanced

days.todaysLearning: Today, participants will present their AI implementation strategies, demonstrating their understanding of AI integration and workflow enhancement. They will receive feedback from peers and the instructor, reflecting on their learning journey throughout the strategy development process.

lessons.title: AI Strategy Presentations
objectives: Present AI implementation strategies
Demonstrate understanding of AI workflow integration
lessons.homework: Write reflection on strategy development learning

weeks.weeklyObjective: Understand AI ethics and responsible implementation

days.todaysLearning: Today, participants will be introduced to the concept of AI ethics and responsible implementation, understanding why ethical considerations are crucial and the principles of responsible AI use. They will engage in activities that help them identify ethical challenges and develop frameworks for responsible AI adoption.

lessons.title: AI Ethics Introduction
objectives: Explain why AI ethics matter in the workplace
Describe key principles of responsible AI use
activities: Lecture: The importance of AI ethics
lessons.homework: Read AI ethics guidelines pp. 28-32

days.todaysLearning: Today, participants will delve into specific ethical challenges in AI implementation, learning about bias, fairness, and transparency issues. They will engage in case study analysis to examine real-world ethical dilemmas and develop skills for identifying and addressing ethical concerns.

lessons.title: AI Bias and Fairness Exploration
objectives: Identify types of AI bias and fairness issues
Explain strategies for addressing ethical concerns
activities: Interactive demonstration: Bias in AI systems
Case study analysis: Real-world AI bias examples
lessons.homework: Complete AI ethics case study worksheet

days.todaysLearning: Today, participants will compare and contrast different approaches to AI governance and policy, understanding the significance of various regulatory frameworks in the context of workplace AI implementation. They will engage in activities that help them visualize the differences between governance approaches.

lessons.title: AI Governance vs. Self-Regulation
objectives: Compare different AI governance approaches
Explain why organizations need AI policies
activities: Think-Pair-Share: Why do we need AI governance?
Lecture: Introduction to AI policy frameworks
Comparison activity: Governance vs. Self-regulation chart
lessons.homework: Practice problems on AI policy development

days.todaysLearning: Today, participants will model the process of implementing ethical AI policies, using frameworks and guidelines to demonstrate their understanding of responsible AI deployment. They will also engage in simulations to explore the factors that affect ethical AI implementation.

lessons.title: AI Ethics Implementation Models
objectives: Model the process of ethical AI implementation
Demonstrate understanding of responsible AI deployment
activities: Modeling activity: Ethics policy development exercise
lessons.homework: Prepare for unit assessment

days.todaysLearning: Today, participants will take a unit assessment to demonstrate their understanding of AI fundamentals, applications, and ethics. They will also reflect on their learning journey throughout the unit, mapping their progress and identifying areas for continued development.

lessons.title: AI Fundamentals Unit Assessment
objectives: Demonstrate understanding of AI tools, techniques, and ethics
activities: Unit assessment: Multiple choice and scenario analysis
lessons.homework: None - prepare for advanced applications!

weeks.weeklyObjective: Explore advanced AI applications and workplace transformation

days.todaysLearning: Today, participants will be introduced to advanced AI applications and workplace transformation strategies, understanding how AI can fundamentally change work processes and organizational capabilities. They will engage in activities that help them visualize comprehensive AI transformation and identify advanced AI implementation approaches.

lessons.title: Advanced AI Applications Introduction
objectives: Identify advanced AI workplace applications
Explain how AI transforms organizational capabilities
activities: Introduction to advanced applications: AI Transformation
Video: 'AI: Transforming the Future of Work'
Application mapping activity: Creating transformation charts
lessons.homework: Read advanced AI applications pp. 40-45

days.todaysLearning: Today, participants will focus on AI for decision-making and strategic planning, learning about AI's role in analysis and planning processes. They will engage in activities that help them understand how AI can enhance decision-making and support strategic business functions.

lessons.title: AI for Decision-Making Focus
objectives: Describe AI's role in decision-making processes
Explain how AI supports strategic planning
activities: Lecture: AI in strategic planning and analysis
lessons.homework: Create AI decision-support plan

days.todaysLearning: Today, participants will analyze how AI applications work together in complex organizational systems, exploring the concept of AI ecosystem integration and comprehensive transformation strategies. They will engage in activities that help them visualize AI relationships and understand system-wide AI implementation.

lessons.title: AI Ecosystem Integration
objectives: Analyze how AI applications integrate across organizations
Describe comprehensive AI transformation approaches
activities: Group exploration: AI ecosystem mapping stations
lessons.homework: Research question: Choose an AI transformation to explore

days.todaysLearning: Today, participants will explore how to measure AI impact and ROI, analyzing the metrics and evaluation approaches for AI implementations. They will engage in activities that help them understand the quantitative and qualitative aspects of AI success measurement.

lessons.title: AI Impact Measurement and ROI
objectives: Explain how to measure AI implementation success
Analyze ROI calculation methods for AI projects
activities: Gallery walk: AI success metrics examples
Discussion: Quantitative vs. qualitative AI impact
Case study analysis: ROI measurement approaches
lessons.homework: Continue research for impact measurement project

days.todaysLearning: Today, participants will work on their comprehensive AI transformation research projects, exploring advanced AI implementation strategies and preparing to present their findings. They will receive feedback from peers and the instructor, refining their presentations to ensure depth and practical applicability.

lessons.title: AI Transformation Research Project
objectives: Research comprehensive AI transformation strategies
Present findings using advanced AI concepts
lessons.homework: Complete draft of transformation project for Monday

weeks.weeklyObjective: Synthesize understanding of AI fundamentals and workplace transformation

days.todaysLearning: Today, participants will present their AI transformation research projects, demonstrating their understanding of comprehensive AI implementation and strategic transformation approaches. They will receive feedback from peers and the instructor, reflecting on their learning journey throughout the project.

lessons.title: AI Transformation Presentations
objectives: Present research on comprehensive AI transformation
Evaluate peer transformation strategies
lessons.homework: Prepare for final presentations (if not presented today)

days.todaysLearning: Today, participants will continue presenting their AI transformation research projects, synthesizing their learning from all presentations. They will engage in a class discussion to identify common themes and insights, creating a knowledge repository to visualize comprehensive AI implementation strategies.

lessons.title: AI Transformation Presentations (cont.)
objectives: Present research on AI transformation strategies
Synthesize learning from all transformation presentations
activities: Class discussion: Common themes and insights
Knowledge repository creation: AI transformation map
lessons.homework: Reflection: What was most valuable about AI workplace applications?

days.todaysLearning: Today marks the completion of our comprehensive AI workplace transformation journey. Participants will engage in final course reflection, receive their completion certificates, and establish ongoing learning commitments. This capstone session celebrates achievements while setting the foundation for continued AI development and implementation in their professional contexts.

lessons.title: Course Completion & Future AI Leadership
objectives: Reflect on complete AI learning journey
Commit to ongoing AI leadership and development
lessons.assessment: Final comprehensive reflection and leadership commitment
lessons.homework: Begin your AI transformation journey - implement your strategy!
